name: The C Team
description:
The C Team is a party based adventure where you suck, shock, and soar your way through a polluted ocean. Three retired heroes reunite to fend off the boats once more, and uncover the horror drawing them towards their ocean home.

Team up and combine your powers as Marge the whale, River the electric eel, and Gloria the seagull. 

  • Each character brings their own power to the stage, combining them together to clean up the ocean, zap through the muck, and soar through the sea.
  • Absorb the trash you can, but keep an eye out for the indigestibles. 
  • Duck, weave, suck and shock your way through four different levels.

FEATURES

  • Four separate levels, with a narrative to pull you through.
  • You say low-budget aesthetic, we say quirky vibes.
  • Two boss battles.                                  

CREDITS

  • Created for the IGDA Foundation "Combination "Game Jam 2022 
  • Programming by Beca Vessal (she/her) and Melody Yang (they/them)
  • Music and Audio by Ace Luke (she/they)
  • Animation by Faith Seungjin Mun (she/her)
  • Combat/Level Design by Aviva Schecterson (she/her) and Ayomide Akinbo (he/him)
  • Narrative Design by Alejandro Ruiz del Sol (he/they) and William Hinz (they/them)
